name: Tools Up!
detailed_description:
Imagine you and your friends renovating an apartment – busy work, right? Well, you can test them out in this fast and fun co-op game! Tools Up! lets you gather up to four players on your couch and paint walls, tear off wallpaper, and move, uh… couches against the clock! So be sure not to get in the way!


The inhabitants of a mysterious skyscraper have left their homes in your hands. All that is left is a blueprint of how the flat should look when they come back. Cooperate (or don’t – we don’t judge) with your friends to make their dreams a reality!



Tear down walls, lay tiles, and throw everything you need to one another across the apartments, hoping to not make it messier than it was before. It's so easy you won't be able to mess it up! Or is it…? Bored with the campaign? We have Party Mode that lets you choose the level you want to master. Be the home improvement you always wanted to see. Be Tools Up Co.


Already excited? Check out the features:

  • There are four characters when you start but so many more to unlock and love!

  • Sprinkle some rainbows on dull, gray apartments. Make them shine! Make them wonderful!

  • Playful and fun gameplay requires a fun and playful art style – and we have both covered in Tools Up!

  • Afraid of messing up the game for fellow players? Don’t be! Tools Up! lets you take whatever part you want in the renovation! Are you a hardcore renovator that wants to multitask? Great! Or are you more of a furniture pusher? That’s amazing too! Just running around and being a clown is still an important role – apartment renovation is a complicated science. Suit yourself.

    [*Remember that only the person holding the blueprint can change camera angles. Use it for good. OR FOR EVIL! Go on… create some chaos![/list]
    • Throw things to people… in other rooms! Just be sure to clean up any mess afterwards.
    • Throw people… to other rooms! It’s always fun. Oh – and do backflips! Make people laugh!
    • Each campaign mission is unlocked in Party Mode for you and your friends to master! Get the highest ranking in all the levels! We know you can do it!
    • Expecting ice, fire, or puppies? No? Well, you should! The levels and environments of Tools Up! are rich and varied. Expect different weather too.

short_description: Tools Up! is a couch co-op game about renovating apartments in a mysterious skyscraper. Work together against the racing clock: paint walls, move furniture, lay tiles, and unlock the secrets of the building!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
